"Xiandy": "Something's different about the City. Have you noticed? Not to mention the enemies."
"...Gaeira. That's what we call the brightly shining variable star in the night sky."
"We think the cause of these recent changes has something to do with Gaeira."
"Around this time of year, Gaeira's particular brightness seems to impart some sort of influence on the local flora and fauna."
"What's more, this has the potential to affect enemy behavior, particularly the Alters at night."
"What I want to ask of you is to investigate these Alters."
"Would you supply me with some battle data for any Alters marked with Season Symbols you encounter at night?"
"I've transferred additional enemy details to that terminal over there, so please make use of it."
"Special rewards have been made available for participants."
